traits.name: Charge
entries: If the goristro moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 38 ({@damage 7d10}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: The goristro can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The goristro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
entries: The goristro deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The goristro makes three attacks: two with its fists and one with its hoof.

actions.name: Fist
entries: Melee atk +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 20 (3d8 + 7 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hoof
entries: Melee atk +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 23 (3d10 + 7 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Gore
entries: Melee atk +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 45 (7d10 + 7 damage) piercing damage.
